2. [("key genes" OR "biomarkers") AND ("liposarcoma" OR "sarcoma") AND ("single-cell sequencing" OR "single-cell RNA")]

3. [("tumor immunity" OR "immune cells") AND ("liposarcoma") AND ("gene expression" OR "transcriptomic profile")]

4. [("liposarcoma" AND "immune landscape") AND ("RNA-seq" OR "transcriptomic analysis") AND ("public datasets" OR "data resources")]

5. [("therapeutic targets" OR "targeted therapy") AND ("liposarcoma") AND ("immune microenvironment" OR "immune response") AND ("transcriptomics" OR "genomic analysis")]
